data.metadata: {"description":"Already reviewed to my Giga chad frien, decided to vouch for him! Always supportive and friendly!"}

translation.translatedDescription: Already reviewed to my Giga chad friend, decided to vouch for him! Always supportive and friendly!

data.metadata: {"description":"Pavil is one of the giga chad brothers that I respect the most. His energy, enthusiasm, unique personality, and the culture he brings is what pushes my passion to the max."}

translation.translatedDescription: Pavil is one of the giga chad brothers that I respect the most. His energy, enthusiasm, unique personality, and the culture he brings is what pushes my passion to the max.

data.metadata: {"description":"Pavil is an artist I met on the abstract chain. He is a committed person who gives a lot to the ecosystem. Always there to give a helping hand to people who need it. What surprised me the most about Pavil are his live street artists, his tags are truly incredible. He has become a giga chad and he deserves it."}

translation.translatedDescription: Pavil is an artist I met on the abstract chain. He is a committed person who gives a lot to the ecosystem, always there to lend a helping hand to people who need it. What surprised me the most about Pavil are his live street art performances; his tags are truly incredible. He has become a giga chad, and he deserves it.

translation.translatedDescription:
Known this goat since I joined the space, his street art is absolutely amazing and is probably one of the coolest initiatives I've seen in this space from art perspective

Super supportive and kind too

Nothing but the best to say about Pavil

data.author: 0x50641a31170bdC620f1c90f00C9d8f8e6E095BD6

data.metadata:
{"description":"J‚Äôai d√©couvert PAVIL gr√¢ce √† son art, et ce fut une v√©ritable r√©v√©lation.
Son talent est incroyable : les fresques qu‚Äôil r√©alise sont d‚Äôune richesse et d‚Äôune pr√©cision qui laissent sans voix. Chaque d√©tail raconte une histoire, chaque couleur est choisie avec soin, et l‚Äôensemble d√©gage une √©motion rare.

Mais ce qui rend PAVIL encore plus admirable, c‚Äôest sa personnalit√©. Au-del√† de son immense talent, c‚Äôest quelqu‚Äôun de chaleureux, humble et bienveillant, toujours pr√™t √† partager sa passion et √† encourager les autres. Travailler ou √©changer avec lui est un vrai plaisir.

D√©couvrir son travail, c‚Äôest bien plus qu‚Äôadmirer de l‚Äôart : c‚Äôest ressentir la passion et l‚Äô√©nergie qu‚Äôil met dans chacune de ses cr√©ations."}

translation.translatedDescription:
I discovered PAVIL through his art, and it was a true revelation.
His talent is incredible: the frescoes he creates are of a richness and precision that leave you speechless. Each detail tells a story, each color is chosen with care, and the whole exudes a rare emotion.

But what makes PAVIL even more admirable is his personality. Beyond his immense talent, he is someone warm, humble, and kind, always ready to share his passion and encourage others. Working or interacting with him is a real pleasure.

Discovering his work is much more than admiring art: it is feeling the passion and energy he puts into each of his creations.

translation.translatedDescription: I first came across PavelÔªø's work on X and was truly blown away by the scale and quality of their projects. They are a highly knowledgeable and respected contributor in the Web3. Content is both educational and engaging, making complex topics accessible to a wide audience. Beyond expertise, PavelÔªø is an approachable and supportive community member, always willing to help others learn and grow.

translation.translatedDescription: Absolutely Abstract coded person. Met him first time during summer 2024 on-chain. He is trying to follow his own way in content creating + love to read his Technical Analysis about DeFi in Abstract.

Yes, we first met in Abstract. It's a pleasure to see how she supports the ecosystem and the people within it. She plays games, streams the process, and collects NFTs + on top of all that, she recently joined Lil Pudgy as a holder. This is what true, genuine support looks like.
